S03n238:1: śīlavatāmihaivābhiprāyāḥ kalyāṇāḥ samṛdhyanti prāgeva paratreti śīlaviśuddhau prayatitavyam |
S03n238:3: bodhisattvaḥ kila kasmiṃścinnātimahati kahlāra-tāmarasa-kamala-kuvalayavibhūṣitarucirasalile haṃsa-kāraṇḍava-cakravāka-mithunopaśobhite tīrāntaruhatarukusumāvakīrṇe sarasi matsyādhipatirbabhūva |
S03n238:4: svabhyastabhāvācca bahuṣu janmāntareṣu parārthacaryāyāstatrastho'pi parahitasukhapratipādanavyāpāro babhūva |
S03n238:5: abhyāsayogāddhi śubhāśubhāni karmāṇi sātmyena bhavanti puṃsām |
S03n238:7: iṣṭānāmiva ca sveṣāmapatyānāmupari niviṣṭahārdo mahāsattvasteṣāṃ mīnānāṃ dānapriyavacanārthacaryādikramaiḥ paramanugrahaṃ cakāra |
S03n238:9: yogādupāyajñatayā ca teṣāṃ vismārayāmāsa sa matsyavṛttam ||2 ||
S03n238:10: tattena samyakparipālyamānaṃ vṛddhiṃ parāṃ mīnakulaṃ jagāma |
S03n238:12: atha kadācitsattvānāṃ bhāgyasampadvaikalyātpramādācca varṣādhikṛtānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ na samyagdevo vavarṣa |
S03n238:13: athāsamyagvarṣiṇi deve tatsaraḥ phullakadambakusumagaureṇa navasalilena na yathāpuramāpupūre |
S03n238:14: krameṇa copagate nidāghakālasamaye paṭutaradīptibhiḥ khedālasagatibhiriva ca dinakarakiraṇaistadabhitaptayā ca dharaṇyā jvālānugateneva ca hlādābhi lāṣiṇā mārutena tarṣavaśādiva pratyahamāpīyamānaṃ tatsaraḥ palvalībabhūva |
S03n238:17: atha bodhisattvo vāyasagaṇairapi paritarkyamāṇaṃ prāgeva salilatīrāntacāribhiḥ pakṣigaṇairviṣādadainyavaśagaṃ vispanditamātraparāyaṇaṃ mīnakulamavekṣya karuṇāyamānaścintāmāpede |
S03n238:25: tatkimatra prāptakālaṃ syāditi vimṛśansa mahātmā satyādhiṣṭhānamekamārtāyanaṃ dadarśa |
S03n238:26: karuṇayā ca samāpīḍyamānahṛdayo dīrghamuṣṇamabhiniśvasya nabhaḥ samullokayannavāca-
S03n238:27: smarāmi na prāṇivadhaṃ yathāhaṃ sañcintya kṛcchre parame'pi kartum |
S03n238:29: atha tasya mahātmanaḥ puṇyopacayaguṇātsatyādhiṣṭhānabalāttadabhiprasāditadevanāgayakṣānubhāvācca samantatastoyābalambibimbā gambhīramadhuranirghoṣā vidyullatālaṅkṛtanīlavipulaśikharā vijṛmbhamāṇā iva pravisarpibhiḥ śikharabhujaiḥ pariṣvajamānā iva cānyonyamakālameghāḥ kālameghāḥ prādurabhavan |
S03n238:30: diśāṃ pramiṇvanta iva prayāmaṃ śṛṅgairvitanvanta ivāndhakāram |
S03n238:32: saṃsaktakekaiḥ śikhibhiḥ prahṛṣṭaiḥ saṃstūyamānā iva nṛttacitraiḥ |
S03n238:34: muktā vimuktā iva tairvimuktā dhārā nipetuḥ praśaśāma reṇuḥ |
S03n238:40: atha bodhisattvaḥ samantato'bhiprasṛtairāpāṇḍubhiḥ salilapravāhairāpūryamāṇe sarasi dhārānipātasamakālameva vidrute vāyasādye pakṣigaṇe pratilabdhajīvitāśe ca pramudite mīnagaṇe prītyābhisāryamāṇahṛdayo varṣanivṛttisāśaṅkaḥ punaḥ punaḥ parjanyamābabhāṣe-
S03n238:45: āvarjitā yatkalaśā iveme kṣaranti ramyastanitāḥ payodāḥ ||15 ||
S03n238:46: mahatpramādaskhalitaṃ tvidaṃ me yannāma kṛtyeṣu bhavadvidhānām |
S03n238:48: cintāṃ kṛthā mā tadataḥ paraṃ tvaṃ satāṃ hi kṛtyodvahane'smi dhuryaḥ |
S03n238:52: tadevaṃ śīlavatāmihaivābhiprāyāḥ kalyāṇāḥ samṛdhyanti prāgeva paratreti śīlaviśuddhau prayatitavyam |
